content: with slip_stitch to 3rd chain in ch3 round 10-12 repeat rounds 3-5 round 13-18 ch2 1 half_double_crochet in each cluster center and 2 half_double_crochet in each horizontal bar join with slip_stitch to 2nd chain in ch2 round 19-21 repeat rounds 3-5 copyright©2008 debbie edgerly all rights reserved page 2 of 3 round 22-25 ch3 1 double_crochet in each cluster center and 2 double_crochet in each horizontal bar around join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain in ch3 round 26-28 repeat rounds 3-5 last round ch1 1 single_crochet in each cluster center and 2 single_crochet in each horizontal bar around join with slip_stitch to ch1 handle straps make 2 measure and mark bag for handles row1 join with slip_stitch to top edge of bag for handle at marking ch1 single_crochet in same stitch at joining single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 5 single_crochet turn row 2 ch1 single_crochet across 5 single_crochet turn repeat row 2 until handle measures desired length join to bag repeat for 2nd handle strap finishing join with slip_stitch last row of bag top edge of bag ch1 single_crochet in each stitch along top of bag and side edges of handle to create finished edge join with slip stitch to ch1 enjoy your new bag and all the compliments that you will receive on it copyright©2008 debbie edgerly all rights reserved page 3 of 3
